metadata.name: Eternal Light - Miindo & Marilyn Monroe #1
metadata.description:
The work refers to "the light of healing," a message that light shows a way to step into a new stage in life beyond past wounds.  Utilizing light as medium in Han Hoâ€™s work, the artist creates a new sense of spatiality and diversity while retaining sensitivity and lyricism of painting.
